item.title: 瓦尔德支持的西班牙银行计划将 SRT 与信用卡贷款挂钩
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Varde Partners LP 旗下的西班牙在线贷款公司 WiZink Bank SA 正在进行与信用卡贷款相关的重大风险转移。【原文：WiZink Bank SA, a Spanish online lender owned by Varde Partners LP, is working on a significant risk transfer tied to credit card loans, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长多伦茨认为明年通胀将出现超调
item.description: 欧洲央行管理委员会成员普里莫兹-多伦茨（Primoz Dolenc）表示，欧元区通胀率放缓的程度可能会比人们担心的要低，2026 年欧洲央行的通胀率可能会低于 2% 的目标，从而支持稳健的利率政策。【原文：Euro-area inflation is likely to slow less significantly below the European Central Bank’s 2% target in 2026 than feared, supporting the case for a steady hand on interest rates, Governing Council member Primoz Dolenc said.】

item.title: 二十国集团权衡债务减免计划被指过于臃肿的解决方案
item.description: 20 国集团的协调债务减免倡议自 2020 年启动以来，因其过于缓慢和臃肿而受到指责。【原文：Support is growing for enhancements to the Group of 20’s coordinated debt-relief initiative, faulted for being too slow and unwieldy since its inception in 2020.】

item.title: 万宝盛华集团恢复增长，显示就业市场稳定
item.description: 万宝盛华集团（ManpowerGroup Inc.【原文：ManpowerGroup Inc. posted its first quarterly revenue gain since early 2022, an indication the global labor market is more resilient than thought.】

item.title: 印度称不了解特朗普与莫迪就俄罗斯石油问题的对话
item.description: 在美国领导人表示他与印度总理进行了交谈并承诺停止购买俄罗斯石油数小时后，印度外交部表示不知道美国总统唐纳德-特朗普与印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪周三进行了会谈。【原文：India’s foreign ministry said it’s unaware of a conversion between President Donald Trump and Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Wednesday, hours after the US leader said he spoke with his Indian counterpart, who pledged to halt Russian oil purchases.】

item.title: 百达翡丽加入价值 13 万亿美元的 ETF 基金竞赛，测试 "大趋势
item.description: 当皮克泰集团于 2020 年 10 月在美国开设第一家办事处时，第五大道上冷冷清清。疫情肆虐的纽约已经关门歇业，公司的到来在中城空旷的街道上几乎无人问津。【原文：When Pictet Group opened its first US office in October 2020, Fifth Avenue was deserted. With a pandemic-struck New York shuttered, the firm’s arrival went largely unnoticed on an empty stretch of Midtown.】

item.title: 停摆如何切断了指导美联储决策的关键数据
item.description: 在美国经济的关键时刻，政府停摆让政策制定者无所适从。美联储官员准备在 10 月底决定是继续降息还是保持利率稳定，但他们必须在有限的新鲜数据面前做出决定。【原文：The government shutdown has left policymakers flying blind at a crucial moment for the US economy. Federal Reserve officials are preparing to decide in late October whether to keep lowering interest rates or hold them steady — but they’ll have to do so with limited fresh data.】

item.title: 数十亿美元交易背后鲜为人知的加密货币巨头
item.description: 在短短两年时间里，这个由一小群工程师建立起来的鲜为人知的去中心化交易所吸引了重量级投资者和数十亿美元的交易量。【原文：In just two years, a little-known decentralized exchange built by a small group of engineers has drawn heavyweight investors and billions in trading volume.】

item.title: 美联储主席沃勒呼吁谨慎缩表，米兰主张采取更大举措
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）表示，官员们可以继续以四分之一个百分点的幅度降低利率，以支持摇摇欲坠的劳动力市场，而斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）则继续主张更大幅度地降低利率。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said officials can keep lowering interest rates in quarter-percentage-point increments to support a faltering labor market, while Stephen Miran continued to advocate a larger reduction.】

item.title: 贝伦贝格下调路威酩轩集团评级，称奢侈品超级周期已结束
item.description: 贝伦贝格（Berenberg）分析师认为，奢侈品行业三十年的繁荣期已经结束，该分析师下调了路威酩轩集团（LVMH）的评级，与此同时，该公司股价出现了自 2001 年以来的最大涨幅。【原文：The luxury sector’s three-decade boom is over, according to Berenberg analysts whose downgrade of LVMH coincided with the stock’s biggest surge since 2001.】

item.title: 巴芬称德国大宗商品交易商 BayWa 的账目存在漏洞
item.description: 德国金融监管机构 Bafin 称，BayWa AG 的 2023 年账目存在缺陷。该公司股价下跌。【原文：BayWa AG’s 2023 accounts were deficient, Germany’s financial watchdog Bafin said. The firm’s share price dropped.】

item.title: 美联储主席米兰表示赞成降息半点
item.description: 美联储理事斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）表示，他赞成本月降息半个百分点，并重申了他的观点，即贸易紧张局势增加了经济的不确定性，加大了经济增长的下行风险。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran said he would favor a half-point interest-rate cut this month, and repeated his view that trade tensions add uncertainty to the economy and increase downside risks to growth.】

item.title: 欧洲最大企业盈利飙升，为本季度奠定基调
item.description: 在报告季初期，投资者对欧洲一些最大公司的积极盈利消息给予了慷慨奖励，从而引发了股市上涨和对年底反弹的乐观情绪。【原文：Investors are generously rewarding positive earnings news from some of Europe’s biggest companies early in the reporting season, sparking equity gains and optimism for a year-end rally.】

item.title: 德意志银行对阿斯利康的产品线表示担忧，阿斯利康遭到罕见抛售
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）分析师周四罕见地下调了阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca Plc）的卖出评级，对该公司的药物管线，尤其是乳腺癌治疗药物管线持怀疑态度。【原文：AstraZeneca Plc got a rare sell rating on Thursday as Deutsche Bank AG analysts downgraded the British drugmaker, taking a more skeptical view on the company’s drug pipeline, in particular for breast cancer treatments.】

item.description:

item.title: 电视上的 Instagram 是一个需要根本性变革的想法
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，库尔特-瓦格纳（Kurt Wagner）将报道 Instagram 的电视应用程序计划。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Kurt Wagner reports on Instagram’s plans for a TV app.】

item.title: 中美贸易战沸沸扬扬并演变为个人恩怨
item.description: 中美贸易战已经持续了大半年，但在本周，双方的相互指责达到了沸点，并做出了高风险外交中罕见的举动：它变得非常个人化。【原文：The US-China trade war has been simmering for most of the year, but this week marks the point at which the finger-pointing boiled over and did something rare in high-stakes diplomacy: It got very personal.】

item.title: 稳定币的蔓延敲响了金融稳定风险的警钟
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济学编辑。今天我们将关注马克-施罗尔斯（Mark Schroers）和劳拉-努南（Laura Noonan）关于国际货币基金组织（IMF）和世界银行会议进展过程中人们对稳定币的担忧的报道。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. item.title: 中国对加拿大石油的需求将创历史新高
item.description: 加拿大对中国的石油出口有望在本月创下历史新高，因为随着亚洲巨头不再使用美国原油，加拿大对中国的石油购买量激增。【原文：Canadian oil exports to China are on pace for a record month amid a surge of purchases as the Asian giant pivots away from US crude.】

item.description: 宜家正将小镇作为新的增长引擎。【原文：IKEA is looking to small towns as a new engine of growth.】

item.title: 地缘政治引发非洲市场 2021 年以来最严重下滑
item.description: 去年，面对动荡的贸易环境和紧张的地缘政治局势，非洲主要金融市场遭遇挫折，市场深度减弱，交易额下降。【原文：Africa’s leading financial markets suffered a setback last year as market depth weakened and turnover declined in the face of a turbulent trade climate and geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: 丹-桑德海姆的 D1 为新私募股权投资基金寻求 10 亿美元投资
item.description: 随着对冲基金公司深入非流动性投资领域，D1 Capital Partners 旨在为新的私募股权基金募集超过 10 亿美元的资金。【原文：D1 Capital Partners aims to raise more than $1 billion for a new private equity fund as the hedge fund firm pushes deeper into illiquid investing.】

item.title: 金融科技公司 Glow 募集 6500 万美元，阿波罗和 "有线牛仔 "马龙提供支持
item.description: 电话融资公司 Glow Services Corp. 已从包括有线电视亿万富翁约翰-马龙（John Malone）和阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Phone financing company Glow Services Corp. has raised $65 million in equity funding from backers including cable billionaire John Malone and Apollo Global Management Inc., as it looks to expand into new markets and develop new products.】

item.title: 美国太阳能产业萎缩，硅谷押宝太阳能初创企业
item.description: 美国一家初创公司正在推动安装家用太阳能和电池，以获得电力订阅服务，风险投资家们向该公司投入了7500万美元。【原文：Venture capitalists are among investors putting $75 million into a US startup’s push to install home solar and batteries for an electricity subscription — just as the residential market shrinks.】

item.title: 客户恢复 IT 支出，Infosys 收窄收入预期
item.description: Infosys Ltd.上调了全年收入预期的下限，寄希望于人工智能等技术支出的复苏。【原文：Infosys Ltd. raised the lower end its forecast for yearly revenue, banking on a revival in spending on technologies such as artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 英特尔和 AMD 股权赠送使股价飙升，尽管股价被稀释
item.description: 发行新股通常被认为是导致股东情绪低落的原因，因为股东的情绪会被稀释。但在这个人工智能大行其道的市场，这一逻辑被颠覆了。【原文：Issuing new shares is usually considered a recipe for souring sentiment as stockholders get diluted. But in this go-go artificial intelligence-crazed market, that logic has been turned upside down.】

item.title: 乌克兰声称俄罗斯炼油厂罢工，普京压力增大
item.description: 乌克兰总参谋部声称对俄罗斯石油公司（Rosneft PJSC）的萨拉托夫炼油厂进行了打击，北约盟国加大了对俄罗斯能源业的压力，以促使总统弗拉基米尔-普京坐到谈判桌前。【原文：Ukraine’s General Staff claimed a strike on Rosneft PJSC’s Saratov refinery as NATO allies ramp up pressure on Russia’s energy industry to bring President Vladimir Putin to the negotiating table.】
